embeds.title: ‚úÖ Staff Application Accepted! ‚úÖ
embeds.description:
Congratulations! Your application to join the staff team at **{server_name}** has been accepted!

You have been given the trial staff role and will undergo a probationary period to ensure you're a good fit for our team. During this time, a senior staff member will guide you through your duties and responsibilities.

Welcome to the team! üíñ

footer.text: Dating Server Support ‚Ä¢ Welcome to the team!

embeds.title: ‚ùå Staff Application Status ‚ùå
embeds.description:
Thank you for your interest in joining the staff team at **{server_name}**.

After careful consideration, we've decided not to move forward with your application at this time. This doesn't reflect on you personally, and we encourage you to apply again in the future as you continue to be an active member of our community.

If you have any questions about our decision, feel free to reach out to a server admin.

Thank you for your understanding. üíï

footer.text: Dating Server Support ‚Ä¢ Thank you for understanding
